Class SSLCertUtils

Class responsoble for generating self-signed certificate which is used

      Returns:

    • generateKeyStore

      public static void generateKeyStore(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.GeneralNames names) throws CertificateException, IOException, org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException, KeyStoreException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Creates new keystore, saves newly created certificate to it and stores the keystore in the file named keystore.
      Parameters:
      names - certificate owner info.
      Throws:
      CertificateException
      IOException
      org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException
      KeyStoreException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • verifyKeyStorePresent

      public static void verifyKeyStorePresent(Logger logger, org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.GeneralNames names)
      Verifies if the file called "keystore" exists. If file doesn't exist, it creates new keystore, generates new keypair, creates new self-signed certificate out of the generated keypair and stores it in the keystore.
      Parameters:
      logger - logger
      names - certificate owner info.
